update.description: Update: 03/08/2017: 0.1. Beta release with updator full working. 0.1.2. Will even update if you replaced your default launcher. 0.1.3. Testing update and added image with some other tweaks. 0.1.4. Testing updater again. 0.1.5. Testing preserve settings. 0.1.5.1 Testing preserve settings again. 0.1.5.2 Testing again 0.1.5.3 Testing again and fixed replace default launcher when you don't want to 0.1.5.4 Now settings will save from version to version 0.1.6 Added utility and in it a check to delte the xpak on link 0.1.6.1 Updated with setting for xpak delete 0.1.7.0 List boxes deleted some how? Fixed it
